description:
Travel or trail, work or weekend. This little pack is happy to go anywhere. And at 20L, it's that perfect size for boarding a plane, hitting your local trail, or sprinting for the bus. Built for versatility, the zippered sleeve pulls off a double act as a laptop compartment or a hydration sleeve. Just the right number of pockets make this your go-to bag on every trip, every weekend, and every weekday.

  • Perforated foam harness gives a nice balance of comfort and support
  • Adjustable sternum strap takes tension off the shoulders
  • Separate zippered sleeve holds a laptop or a hydration bladder (sold separately)
  • Zippered top accessory pocket keeps personal items secure
  • Front stretch mesh pocket closes with a buckle, with room for a rain shell
  • Dual side stretch mesh pockets increase your storage options
  • Loop attachment lets you clip on a bike light or carabiner
  • Removable webbing hipbelt
  • Plus Size packs are designed with extended length shoulder straps and hip belts, plus a revised fit to accommodate larger body shapes and sizes
  • Fits hips up to 152cm
name: Gregory Nano 20 Plus Size Daypack - Unisex
